category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_disable_default_classifiable_types
preference.preference_description: Deactivates the usage of the default classifiable types. The default classifiable types are: MEOP, MEOPRevision, MEProcess, MEProcessRevision, MEWorkarea, MEWorkareaRevision, MEActivity, MEActivityRevision. Valid values are true and false (default value).
